name: Toy Soldier Snipe-r Shoot-er 3D
description:
Toy Soldier Sniper Shooter is the latest, first person action sniper shooting game. Become the elite marksmen sniper, taking up position in hidden sniper's nest, eliminate enemy toy army soldiers that occupy the outposts to keep the office safe from attacks. Complete each sniping level by using your ultimate arsenal of sniper rifles to aim for the head of all of the enemies and get the perfect sniper shot to advance to the next zone.

Perform specific objectives in the missions to help you unlock better sniper rifles that will help execute the mission order quickly and more efficiently, making you the professional marksmen you set out to be. With real world guns, you can try out some of the world greatest rifles and feel the power behind each trigger pull.

Scope out the area for troops, plan you method of attack and strike them with all the firepower you have. Once you have fired at the enemy soldiers, they will begin to look for your position and start firing machine gun bullets at you! Eliminate the threat as quickly as possible before your health bar is depleted, or you will fail the mission.

With each new combat level comes even more highly trained enemy commandos with serious firepower who will stop at nothing to take you down. Step into job of the sniper elite with your ultimate marksmen skills and become the most lethal sniper shooter to defeat all enemy toy army soldiers.
